name: Crusader Helmet
description: A helmet worn by the bravest of knights.
tooltip: Your gain 2.5% block chance while wearing this armor.
You take 20% less light damage while wearing this armor.
You take 5% more darkness damage while wearing this armor.
You take 5% less bludgeoning damage while wearing this armor.
You take 25% less slashing damage while wearing this armor.
